Summary: Bright blue light flying extremely fast across the sky
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rosemead
There were no other sightings in Rosemead on or around June 1st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I stepped out the house to smoke a cigarette, I looked up and a bright blue light flew across the sky in approximately 2 seconds at an incredible speed. It couldn't have been an airplane or firework or anything normal. Left me speechless, didn't even bother mentioning it to my brother inside the house. I stood outside looking up and for the duration of my cigarette I didn't see anything else.
